page.title: 16PLACE NAMES IN USE IN 1985
page.content: These come down through dialect and usage. {BATWORTHY} Bat=boundary,enclosed farm {BEETOR }Begatora possibly bend/curve {BUDA }1330-Boghewood, bow shaped wood {COLIHOLE }minor change,Colehall 1330 {CORNDON }Corndoune juxta Chaggeford 1319 {HOLE}Owned by John dela Hulle 1249 {HORSLAKE}No change-1244 {HURSTON }Heort's Tun-farm of the hart {JURSTON}Jordan's farm-origins French? {LANGAFORD}Long ford {LETTAFORD} Clear bright stream {MELDON }Middledone,1432 middle hill {NATTADON}Bare hill/Hnotta's hill,1334 {QUINTADOWN}Country house-Spanish {SHAPLEY}Sheep clearing-Escapeleia 1224 {STINIEL }Stenenhalle 1224 {WEDDICOTT}Wada's cot(e) 1393 {WORMHILL }Place of worms and snakes {YELLANDS }Named owner of'the old land'
